column4: I have a USB stick that won't be recognized, I think it got pulled out while writing, is there anyway to format it somehow? how do I find it when it's plugged in ?
If you are not comfortable with fdisk command line stuff... use gparted
thank you, I'm not comfortable indeed :)
should my USB be fat16 at all?
Can be any partition... better use ntfs
what partition table? it wants msdos
